snippet.title: Comet Angel - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST COMET ANGEL ON STEAM NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2920010/Comet_Angel/

Make an otherworldly discovery in this point and click narrative adventure game! Join teenagers Izzy and Nat as they break out of their small-town summer routine when they discover a real life alien in a pond in their neighbourhood. Help the mysterious extraterrestrial Faerie by finding the food it needs to return home, and help Izzy and Nat as they transition to adulthood and learn to accept themselves and each other.

Comet Angel is an indie visual novel/puzzle game, coming to Mac, PC and Linux in late 2025. Demo coming to Steam in Fall 2024.

A game by Cross Couloir

Voice cast (in order of appearance):
Nat - Alexis Noelle
Izzy - Alicia Yan

#CometAngel #gaming #trailer
